Issue.creator: suryalnvs
Issue.summary: DEFER POST v1.1 - After non-upgraded orderers had panicked when enabled new orderer capability, upgrade them
Issue.description: After non-upgraded orderers panic when enabled new orderer capability (as in FAB-7198), then upgrade them too, and send invokes and queries successfully. Confirm no errors in orderers or peers. Confirm all orderers delivered everything consistently (no forks).
